name: Cutting-Edge House
description: A hypermodern home filled with technology.
showUnlockHint: Build the Living Research Center to unlock!

upgrades.name: Bigger TV
upgrades.description: Improves housing quality by 5. Adds capacity for one resident.

upgrades.name: Air-Cleaning Plant
upgrades.description: A plant that's been cultivated to be extremely good at cleaning the air. Improves housing quality by 10 and makes residents live longer.
